texto1:
Overwatch is a first-person shooter (FPS) video game developed by Blizzard Entertainment. In it, two teams of five players each choose characters with unique abilities and fight on objectives such as capturing and defending points, escorting cargo, among others.

The game's main features are colorful and well-crafted graphics, fast and dynamic gameplay and a wide variety of characters and abilities, as well as a backstory that is told through videos, comics and other means. The game is famous for its focus on teamwork and strategy, and has a large fan base across the world.
